conversion_verification.notes: The model represents a clean 3D isometric cutaway transformation.

3d_conversion_fundamentals.notes: Excellent 3D depth and wall geometry; perspective is clear and consistent.

geometric_accuracy.notes: Missing the specific bay/window seat geometry on the right; interior partition for the stairwell/crawlspace is simplified; window counts on the bottom wall differ slightly from the 2D specifics.

interior_elements.notes: Kitchen, WC, and dining furniture are logically placed, though the 2D utility room is interpreted as a more open alcove.

visual_clarity.notes: High clarity and clean rendering; lack of text or UI clutter.

detected_errors.description: The 'Window Seat' bump-out/alcove on the right of the plan is rendered as a flat wall with standard windows.
Discrepancy in the number and grouping of window panes on the exterior walls compared to architectural markings.

summary: A high-quality 3D conversion that faithfully reproduces the room layout and interior functions, though it simplifies some specific exterior geometric features like the window seat.
